If you need to run any sort of CI environment with parallel tests you're st=
ill going to be needing the patches described in this issue:

http://github=
.com/KentBeck/junit/issues#issue/16

There is a 4.7 fork with these patches=
 available at http://github.com/krosenvold/junit/tree/concurrenycfixes

or =
you can just apply the git patch file from http://github.com/krosenvold/spr=
ing-framework-concurrent-junit-patch/blob/a98e7c0dc140c74566c3aba8f03ac7d76=
9758ab8/junit47ConcurrencyProblems.patch

(The original patches that were m=
ade for this were a bit clumsy in terms of git-ness, but my git-fu is growi=
ng stronger)

Kristian Rosenvold
